short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance online exams with AI based proctoring and monitoring

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Skillwise.ai Proctoring also know as Proctorwise ( beta ), the cutting-edge Chrome Extension brought to you by NG-NeXT Tech—a game-changer in affordable and efficient proctoring solutions for all your assessments.

At NG-NeXT Tech, we're dedicated to elevating your test-taking experience by introducing Proctorwise, an AI-enabled proctoring solution designed to create a secure environment for exams. Our primary goal is to uphold the integrity of assessments, ensuring everyone has an equal opportunity to showcase their best performance.

Key Features:

    Focused Monitoring: Proctorwise will only monitor you during your exam session, ensuring privacy outside of the testing environment.

    Data Security: Your personal information is safe and will never be shared or sold to third parties. Proctorwise strictly adheres to a robust privacy policy, available for review here.

    Limited Access: Proctorwise will not access any personal data beyond what is necessary for the exam itself. Your privacy is of utmost importance.

    Permission Protocol: Prior to installation, Google Chrome will seek your permission. The permissions granted are solely for the duration of the exam and will not be used outside the exam session.

Understanding the Privacy Disclosure:

    READ AND CHANGE ALL YOUR DATA ON THE WEBSITES YOU VISIT: Proctorwise uses this permission during exams to ensure compliance with allowed pages, preventing unauthorized access to external sources.

    DISPLAY NOTIFICATIONS: This allows proctors to send you essential notifications during your exam, ensuring a smooth testing experience.

    COMMUNICATE WITH COOPERATING WEBSITES: Proctorwise may need to communicate with your test delivery provider or learning management system to optimize testing conditions during your exam.

    READ AND MODIFY DATA YOU COPY AND PASTE: To maintain exam integrity, Proctorwise restricts the use of copy and paste during the exam.

This concise breakdown aims to demystify the Chrome extension privacy disclosure, offering clarity on how these features enhance your exam security. Proctorwise is committed to monitoring your activity only during the exam session, prioritizing your data privacy. For more details, refer to our comprehensive privacy policy here. Elevate your assessments with Proctorwise—where security meets efficiency.
